Name: SECTION 1 – MATERIAL, PERSONNEL & THIRD PARTY APPROVAL
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Pothole all services prior to commencement of trenching. Suitably protect the existing services from construction damage.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Confirm on site the exact location of cabling routes before trenching.
○ Where connecting and or coordinating with existing services, engineers shall make local modifications necessary for the correct operation of the entire system.
Verifying Document - Survey data/Comms with Client
1.1.3 - Location of Lighting Poles, Cameras, Cable Pits and Montrose Boxes
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Confirm with surveyor and mark out the exact locations of lighting poles, Cameras, Cable Pits and Montrose boxes before installation.
Verifying Document - Survey data/Comms with Client
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Provide MSB-NMB shop drawings complete with wiring schematics for review and approval by the Engineer prior to construction.
Verifying Document - Shop Drawings and engineers approval

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Supply new Montrose Boxes on concrete plinth as per Electrical Services drawings. Box need to be fitted with a stainless steel hasp and staple brackets to allow for Waka Kotahi to fit their own padlock onto it.
Standard / Specification - PS 23.1.3.b) & 23.1.5 a) ii; Drawing 0413, 0411, 0412.
Verifying Document - Material data sheet and engineers approval
1.2.3 - Luminaires & Poles -WK & TCC Redwood Ln RAB
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Luminaire and Pole types shall be supplied and installed as detailed on the drawings or as per instruction of Client
Verifying Document - Material data sheet and engineers approval
Comments / Closeout Details - Purchase of Luminaires/Poles already approved by Client.
○ PE/SE need to check on site to guarantee right type of luminaries and poles are installed at specific location.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Install new Montrose Boxes on concrete plinth as per Electrical Services drawings.
○ Install stainless steel hasp and staple brackets to allow for Waka Kotahi to fit their own padlock onto it.
Standard / Specification - PS 23.1.3.b) & 23.1.5 a) ii; Drawing 0411 - 0413.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Install an earth electrode in accordance with the AS/NZS 3000. Install new Earth Bar and Neutral Bar c/w MEN link;
○ Install Circuit Protective Devices as specified in Drawings;
○ Install Switchboard as per details in Specification.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Liaise with the client’s electricity retailer for the installation of their three-phase meter within the metering compartment of the new Montrose Box.
○ Metering Agency supply of low Voltage meters and metering current transformers.
Verifying Document - Comms and Photo/Visual Inspection
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Types of luminaires and poles shall be installed as per details on the drawings or as per instruction of Client
○ Luminaires shall be fitted with Shorting Caps.
Standard / Specification - PS 23.1.3 c-d); 23.1.5 f-g) & Drawing 0004, 0407-0409,0413
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Supply and Install final circuit cabling to Luminaires from the Montrose Boxes via underground ducts and conduits as per Drawing - proposed circuiting layout.
Standard / Specification - PS23.1.3 g); 23.1.5 e) & Drawing 0131 -0135
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - As-built drawings with
6) the individual addresses of each luminaire, and their corresponding groups (if DALI) shown clearly for maintenance purposes.
